      • loadPTFromFile

        boolean loadPTFromFile​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane mapCanvas,
                       java.lang.String filePath,
                       Map mainMap,
                       javafx.scene.layout.Pane lineInformationPane)
        Loads the public transport form given file and draws all the vehicles on the given Pane
        Parameters:
        mapCanvas - is the Pane where the vehicles is going to be drawn
        filePath - is the path to file
        mainMap - is connection to map
        lineInformationPane - is connection to information Pane
        Returns:
        true if successful false otherwise
